25g PROTEIN
Waffles

CARROT CAKE PROTEIN WAFFLES

All the flavors of carrot cake in a healthy, protein-packed waffle. Complete with a cream cheese glaze.

25g
Protein
280
Calories
25m
Total Time
4
Yield

Nutrition per 1 waffle

Carbs28g
Fat12g
Fiber6g
Sugar12g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 60g oat flour
  • 30g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 1 egg
  • 120ml unsweetened almond milk
  • 60g grated carrots
  • 1 tsp baking powder
  • 1 tsp cinnamon
  • 1/2 tsp nutmeg
  • 60g cream cheese, softened
  • 30ml milk
  • 1 tbsp powdered sweetener

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Preheat Waffle Iron

Preheat your waffle iron.

2

Mix Batter

In a bowl, mix together oat flour, protein powder, egg, almond milk, grated carrots, baking powder, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

3

Cook Waffles

Pour batter into the preheated waffle iron and cook until golden and crisp.

4

Make Glaze

While the waffles are cooking, whisk together the cream cheese, milk, and powdered sweetener until smooth.

5

Serve

Drizzle the waffles with the cream cheese glaze and top with chopped walnuts or pecans.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
